title: Topic 001 Question 168
body: terraform apply is failing with the following error. What next step should you take to determine the root cause of the problem?
Error loading state: AccessDenied: Access Denied status code: 403, request id: 288766CE5CCA24A0, host id: FOOBAR
options: Review syslog for Terraform error messages
Run terraform login to reauthenticate with the provider
